title: Banks and Private Credit Clash After Dimon’s Cockroach Barb - Yahoo Finance
summary:
A pair of blowups in the credit market have sparked a war of words over whether banks or private credit firms are better positioned to weather a broader downturn.
Lipschultz’s remarks gave voice to the sentiments of a swath of private credit executives.
Banks are being forced to cede ground or learn to live alongside upstart lenders, whether they like it or not.
It risks disrupting a delicate detente over the past few years, as rapidly growing private credit firms have taken some business from banks’ leveraged loan desks, but have also become some of their biggest clients as well as occasional partners.
“I would say it’s going off in both corners.” And there are plenty of distressed players out there who can sift through the private credit blowups or the syndicated loan blowups, according to Shah.

title: The Crypto Industry's Rush To Tokenize Stocks Is Setting Off Alarm Bells—And Wall Street Wants Regulators To Pump The Brakes - Yahoo Finance
summary:
While many tokenized stock products are marketed like actual shares, the fine print tells a different story.
Consider the multiple tokens pegged to Nvidia Corp. (NASDAQ:NVDA) and Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA)—each with different structures, terms, and investor protections.
Wall Street Is Fighting Back Against Proposed Exemptions The crypto industry’s push is getting a boost from the Trump administration, which has indicated plans to grant tokenization firms exemptions from traditional securities rules.
Citadel Securities raised concerns in a letter to the Securities and Exchange Commission in July that tokenization would siphon liquidity away from public markets.

title: Concerns About Bad Loans Rocked Bank Stocks on Thursday—How Many More 'Cockroaches' Are Out There? - Investopedia
summary:
Regional bank stocks tumbled on Thursday after Zions Bancorp said it would write off fraudulent loans made to two borrowers, adding to investors’ fears about lending standards and stress in credit markets.
Zions Bancorp (ZION) on Thursday said it had recently identified “what it believes to be apparent misrepresentations and contractual defaults” by two borrowers.
As a result, it plans to write off $50 million of the $60 million outstanding on the affected loans.
The KBW Regional Banking Index fell 6%.
Bank lending to NDFIs has exploded in the last decade.

title: Eric Trump Teases Tokenized Property Plan as SEC’s Atkins Declares Tokenization ‘Job One’ - Yahoo Finance
summary:
U.S. SEC Chairman Paul Atkins has declared tokenization and crypto regulation “job one” under the new Project Crypto initiative.
Eric Trump Teases Tokenized Real Estate President Donald Trump’s son said the tokenized real estate project will focus on “one specific building,” describing it as a move to democratize access to high-profile real estate.
Real estate tokenization involves converting the value of a physical property into digital tokens, allowing fractional ownership that can be bought, sold, or traded on a blockchain platform.
The comments follow World Liberty Financial’s co-founder, Zach Witkoff, mentioning plans to tokenize Trump real estate during Token2049 in Singapore.
The post Eric Trump Teases Tokenized Property Plan as SEC’s Atkins Declares Tokenization ‘Job One’ appeared first on ccn.com.

title: Lise Wins EU’s First License for Tokenized Stock Exchange - Yahoo Finance
summary:
France’s Lise Exchange has become the first European platform authorized to trade and settle listed shares entirely on blockchain.
The license operates under the European Central Bank (ECB) and the European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA) oversight.
Lise is now the first exchange to combine the functions of a Multilateral Trading Facility (MTF) and a Central Securities Depository (CSD).
The US Securities and Exchange Commission has approved Plume as a registered transfer agent for tokenized securities, linking on-chain shareholder data with the DTCC.
Read original story Lise Wins EU’s First License for Tokenized Stock Exchange by Shota Oba at beincrypto.com Recommended Stories
